title: Verify user login with valid credentials
description: Test that a user can successfully login with correct email and password
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
expected_result: User should be logged in and redirected to dashboard
preconditions: User account must exist in the system

title: Verify invalid login attempt
description: Test that system prevents login with incorrect credentials
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter invalid email
3. Enter invalid password
4. Click Login button
expected_result: Error message 'Invalid credentials' should be displayed

title: Verify invoice creation via API
description: Test invoice creation through REST API endpoint
scenario_examples:
1. Send POST request to /api/invoices
2. Include valid invoice data in request body
3. Verify response status code
steps_to_reproduce: API returns 201 status with created invoice details
expected_result: Valid authentication token must be available

title: Verify payment processing end-to-end
description: Complete payment flow from UI to backend validation
scenario_examples:
1. Login as admin user
2. Navigate to Payments section
3. Initiate new payment
4. Fill payment details
5. Submit payment
6. Verify in database
steps_to_reproduce: Payment is processed successfully and status is updated
expected_result:
1. Admin user logged in
2. Valid vendor exists
3. Sufficient balance available

title: Verify supplier profile update
scenario_examples:
1. Navigate to Suppliers page
2. Click on a supplier
3. Click Edit button
4. Update supplier name and email
5. Save changes
preconditions:
Supplier Name: ACME Corp
Email: acme@example.com

title: Verify ACH payment validation
scenario_examples:
1. Call ACH validation API
2. Pass invalid routing number
3. Verify error response
steps_to_reproduce: API returns 400 error with validation message

title: Verify dashboard data display
description: Test that dashboard shows correct summary data
scenario_examples:
1. Login as admin user
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify all widgets are displayed
4. Check data accuracy
steps_to_reproduce: All dashboard widgets display with correct data
expected_result: User has admin role and data exists in system

title: Verify report generation
scenario_examples:
1. Navigate to Reports section
2. Select month and year
3. Click Generate Report
4. Wait for generation to complete
steps_to_reproduce: Report is generated successfully and downloadable
expected_result: Historical data exists for selected month

title: Verify API rate limiting
description: Test that API enforces rate limits correctly
scenario_examples:
1. Send 100 requests per second
2. Verify 429 response after threshold
3. Wait for cooldown period
4. Verify requests are accepted again

title: Verify bulk data import
description: Test importing multiple records via CSV
scenario_examples:
1. Navigate to Import section
2. Select CSV file with test data
3. Click Import button
4. Verify import results
steps_to_reproduce: All valid records imported successfully with summary
expected_result: CSV file with valid format available

title: Verify payment amount validation
description: Test payment processing with different amounts
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to payment page
2. Enter amount from scenario examples
3. Submit payment
4. Verify response
expected_result: Payment should be validated according to amount rules
